subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा नवीन नगर है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is the famous fort located in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: मेरंगारघाट वह जो जोधपुर में है।
explanation: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It was built in the 15th century and is known for its beautiful architecture and historical significance.
